oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hill's Chapel AME Church: Odie Kay Johnson funeral program
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Welton-Anderson & Son Funeral Home
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Hill's Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church

Funeral service program for Mrs. Odie Kay Johnson that was held on Saturday, June 21, 1980 at Hill's Chapel AME Church in Bell Buckle, Tennessee. At the time of the funeral, Rev. Robert Gardner served as the pastor.

Hill's Chapel AME Church dates from at least the 1920s. Rev. Robert Gardner served as the pastor in 1980. At the time of fieldwork, the church building was in a state of disrepair and no longer utilized as a meeting space.

programs;
